item.description:
## Current Release Notes * Improve text file detection for conflict solver * Expose search filter separators for customization in language localization files * Version filter now filters only requested version * Bugfixes
## 1.22.123 Release Notes * Fix NRE when binary file present in localisation files while evaluating encodings
## Release Notes 1.22 * Update dependencies * Improve detection whether steam is running or not (for steam games) * Add paradox launcher running warning * Button to test configured external diff tool added * Add placeholder logic to let Irony know to ignore certain types (for mod devs) * Change default path for dialogs * Add mod id info to mod collection export metadata * Add definition last modified date info in conflict solver (in tooltips) * Add mod search\filtering OR operator support for certain fields * Exclude non event related namespaces from definition code extraction * Show missing mods notification if mod is deinstalled and is in a collection * Auto detect gog games on windows * Detect and treat as error files without BOM encoding

## Current Release Notes * Improve text file detection for conflict solver * Expose search filter separators for customization in language localization files * Version filter now filters only requested version * Bugfixes
## 1.22.123 Release Notes * Fix NRE when binary file present in localisation files while evaluating encodings
## Release Notes 1.22 * Update dependencies * Improve detection whether steam is running or not (for steam games) * Add paradox launcher running warning * Button to test configured external diff tool added * Add placeholder logic to let Irony know to ignore certain types (for mod devs) * Change default path for dialogs * Add mod id info to mod collection export metadata * Add definition last modified date info in conflict solver (in tooltips) * Add mod search\filtering OR operator support for certain fields * Exclude non event related namespaces from definition code extraction * Show missing mods notification if mod is deinstalled and is in a collection * Auto detect gog games on windows * Detect and treat as error files without BOM encoding
